mapper.select:
SELECT adi.admin_info_id, adi.admin_id, adi.full_name, adi.id_card_no , adi.staff_number, adi.birth_date, adi.gender, adi.mobile_phone FROM admin_info adi INNER JOIN admin ON adi.admin_id=admin.id
adi.the_department=#{theDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND adi.full_name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),"%") AND admin.admin_state=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into admin
id,
role_id,
admin_name,
admin_pass,

admin_state,

update_time,

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ai.admin_info_id) FROM admin_info ai,department_admin da WHERE ai.admin_id = da.admin_id
AND da.d_id = #{parameters.did}
AND ai.full_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{parameters.fullName}),'%')
AND ai.state = '1'

SELECT COUNT(ai.admin_info_id) FROM admin_info ai LEFT JOIN department_admin da ON ai.admin_id = da.admin_id WHERE ai.state = '1'
AND da.id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{parameter}),'%') OR ai.full_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{parameter}),'%')
SELECT admin_info_id FROM admin_info WHERE staff_number = #{staffNum}

SELECT
FROM admin_info ai WHERE ai.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ai.state = '1'

SELECT
FROM admin_role ar WHERE ar.id = #{adminRoleId} AND ar.state = '1'
SELECT a.admin_name FROM admin a WHERE a.id = #{adminId}

SELECT COUNT(ai.admin_id) FROM admin_info ai WHERE ai.state = '1' AND ai.admin_id NOT IN (SELECT di.d_leader_id FROM department_info di)
AND ai.full_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{parameter}),'%')
SELECT ai.admin_id FROM admin_info ai WHERE ai.staff_number = #{staffNumber}
